info.name: üè¢ Society Management - COMPLETE CRUD Collection
info.description: 100% COMPREHENSIVE API Collection with ALL CRUD Operations for EVERY Implemented Feature including Complete Bill Management, Society Settings, Rules & Regulations, Helpdesk Management, and Full Update/Delete Operations

exec: if (pm.response.code === 200) { const r = pm.response.json(); pm.environment.set('super_admin_token', r.tokens.access); console.log('üöÄ Super Admin Login Success'); }
if (pm.response.code === 200) { const r = pm.response.json(); pm.environment.set('access_token', r.tokens.access); pm.environment.set('admin_user_id', r.user.id); console.log('‚úÖ ADMIN Login'); }
if (pm.response.code === 201) { const r = pm.response.json(); pm.environment.set('society_id', r.id); console.log('Society created:', r.name); }

body.raw:
{
    "name": "{{society_name}}",
    "address": "{{society_address}}",
    "city": "{{society_city}}",
    "state": "{{society_state}}",
    "pincode": "{{society_pincode}}",
    "registration_number": "{{society_registration}}"
}

{
    "name": "{{society_name}} - Updated",
    "address": "{{society_address}} - New Address",
    "city": "{{society_city}}",
    "state": "{{society_state}}",
    "pincode": "{{society_pincode}}",
    "registration_number": "{{society_registration}}"
}

exec: if (pm.response.code === 201) { const r = pm.response.json(); pm.environment.set('society_settings_id', r.id); console.log('Society settings created'); }

body.raw:
{
    "society": {{society_id}},
    "default_maintenance_amount": 5000.00,
    "maintenance_due_day": 5,
    "late_fee_percentage": 5.0,
    "allow_marketplace": true,
    "allow_job_postings": true,
    "auto_approve_bookings": false,
    "visitor_approval_required": true,

    "working_hours_start": "09:00",
    "working_hours_end": "18:00",
    "contact_email": "admin@society.com",
    "contact_phone": "{{subadmin_phone}}"
}

{
    "society": {{society_id}},
    "default_maintenance_amount": 6000.00,
    "maintenance_due_day": 10,
    "late_fee_percentage": 7.5,
    "allow_marketplace": true,
    "allow_job_postings": true,
    "auto_approve_bookings": true,
    "visitor_approval_required": false,
    "max_visitor_duration_hours": 48,
    "email_notifications": true,
    "sms_notifications": true,
    "working_hours_start": "08:00",
    "working_hours_end": "20:00",
    "contact_email": "updated@society.com",
    "contact_phone": "{{subadmin_phone}}"
}

exec: if (pm.response.code === 201) { const r = pm.response.json(); pm.environment.set('society_profile_id', r.id); console.log('Society profile with rules created'); }

body.raw:
{
    "society": {{society_id}},
    "established_year": 2020,
    "total_units": 100,
    "society_logo": "https://example.com/logo.png",
    "society_type": "Residential",
    "amenities_list": ["Swimming Pool", "Gym", "Garden", "Parking"],
    "society_rules": "1. No loud music after 10 PM\n2. Pets must be on leash\n3. Visitors must register at gate\n4. No parking in fire lane\n5. Common areas to be kept clean",
    "visitor_policy": "All visitors must register at gate with valid ID. Maximum stay 24 hours without prior approval.",
    "pet_policy": "Pets allowed with society approval. Must be vaccinated and registered.",
    "parking_rules": "Only registered vehicles allowed. No parking in visitor slots.",
    "noise_policy": "No loud music/noise after 10 PM and before 7 AM on weekdays.",
    "office_timings": "9:00 AM to 6:00 PM (Mon-Sat)",
    "emergency_contact": "{{subadmin_phone}}",
    "website": "https://testsociety.com",
    "social_media_links": {"facebook": "fb.com/testsociety", "whatsapp": "wa.me/testsociety"},
    "registration_authority": "Municipal Corporation",
    "gst_number": "12ABCDE1234F1Z5",
    "pan_number": "ABCDE1234F"
}

{
    "society_rules": "UPDATED RULES:
1. No loud music after 9 PM
2. Pets must be on leash in common areas
3. All visitors must register at main gate
4. No parking in fire safety zones
5. Common areas must be kept clean at all times
6. No washing/drying clothes in balconies facing main road
7. Festival celebrations require prior society approval",
    "visitor_policy": "UPDATED: All visitors must register with security guard. ID proof mandatory. Maximum 12-hour stay without approval.",
    "pet_policy": "UPDATED: Maximum 2 pets per flat. All pets must be registered with society office.",
    "parking_rules": "UPDATED: Parking allotted based on flat type. Two-wheelers in designated areas only.",
    "noise_policy": "UPDATED: Complete silence after 10 PM. Generator use restricted to emergency only."
}

item.name: üí∞ Complete Bill Management (All Types + Full CRUD)

exec: if (pm.response.code === 201) { const r = pm.response.json(); pm.environment.set('maintenance_bill_type_id', r.id); console.log('Maintenance bill type created'); }

body.raw:

    "society": {{society_id}},

    "recurrence_period": "monthly",
    "is_splitable": false,
    "default_amount": 5000.00,
    "is_active": true
}

body.raw:

}
